biotools.summary: Performs exact genetic linkage analysis with input-output relationships. Used for analysis of general pedigrees (many individuals, inbreeding loops, many markers, etc.), analysis of two-locus traits or analysis of autosomal or sex-linked traits.

bioschemas.name: SuperLink
bioschemas.summary: Performs exact genetic linkage analysis with input-output relationships. Used for analysis of general pedigrees (many individuals, inbreeding loops, many markers, etc.), analysis of two-locus traits or analysis of autosomal or sex-linked traits.
